content:
We're hosting a FHIR Connectathon track on Consent management and computable consent. Details are posted below:
https://confluence.hl7.org/display/FHIR/2021-09+Consent+Management%2C+Decision%2C+Enforcement+Services%2C+and+Computable+Consent
We will use this thread for zulip conversations about this track.
By Consent do we mean Permission as well? Or only the explicit statement of consent by a patient?
If you have leveraged the current FHIR consent resource to implement a generic permission, that's definitely within the scope of the track.
I would think there should be two tracks. (If there is interest around Permission)

Track Orientation - Sept 1, 2021, 11am-12pm EST
Google Meet link: https://meet.google.com/bpt-gacp-vbe
